Package classifier

Class TreeAugmentedNayveBayes<T>

java.lang.Object
classifier.AbstractClassifier<T>
classifier.AbstractBayes<T>
classifier.TreeAugmentedNayveBayes<T>
Type Parameters:
T - A generic type
All Implemented Interfaces:
Classifier<T>
public class TreeAugmentedNayveBayes<T>
extends AbstractBayes<T>
A class that extends the AbstractBayes class. This class implements the Tree Augmented Nayve Bayes algorithm.
Since:
2020-05-03
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Marcelo Jacinto, David Souto, Gonçalo Tomás
See Also:
Classifier, AbstractClassifier, AbstractBayes, Score, MDLScore, LLScore, DataModel, TrainingModel

  • Field Details

    • theta_ijkc

      protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Double> theta_ijkc
      An hashmap to save the calculations of the theta_ijkc

    • theta_c

      protected double[] theta_c
      An list of double to save the values of theta_c

    • tree

      protected int[] tree
      An int array that inside contains the parent of each node. If inside there is a -1 it means the node of the respective index has no parent node. Example: int[0] = -1 means node 0 has no parent node.

  • Constructor Details

    • TreeAugmentedNayveBayes

      public TreeAugmentedNayveBayes​(Score score, DataModel<T> trainingModel)
      The constructor for the TreeAugmentedNayveBayes class. It receives as parameters a Score and a Datamodel
      Parameters:
      score - A Score to be used to calculate the weight between the edges of the tree
      trainingModel - A DataModel with the counts extrated from the training data
      See Also:
      Score, MDLScore, LLScore, DataModel, TrainingModel

  • Method Details

    • doTrain

      protected void doTrain()
      A method that implements the training method. This method only invokes inside the learnStructure() and learnParameters() methods inside
      Specified by:
      doTrain in class AbstractBayes<T>

    • doPredict

      protected T doPredict​(T[] data)
      A method that makes a prediction when receives an array of data of generic type. This method invokes inside the doPredictOne() method
      Specified by:
      doPredict in class AbstractBayes<T>
      Parameters:
      data - An array of generic type to make predictions with
      Returns:
      A generic with the result of the prediction

    • learnStructure

      protected void learnStructure()
      This method uses the data stored in the trainingModel and the Score to calculate the MST (maximal weighted spanning tree). The structure is then saved in the tree attribute of this class. The content of the array is the index of the parent node of each node corresponding to that index. If the content of some node is -1 it means that node is a root.

    • learnParameters

      protected void learnParameters()
      This method calculates the values for the conditional probabilities for the tree structure saved in the attribute tree. The values for the conditional probabilities are saved in the hashMap "theta_ijkc" and in the double array "theta_c"

    • doPredictOne

      protected T doPredictOne​(T[] data)
      This method makes a prediction by calculating the multiplication of the conditional probabilities. In reality if calculates the sum of the logarithm of the conditional probabilities to avoid numerical problems. Then it choosen the class with the highest probability and returns it. If data[i] contains a value that is not in the DataModel, it returns null
      Parameters:
      data - An array of generic type with data to make the prediction with
      Returns:
      A generic with the prediction

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Redefinition of the toString() method that returns a string with the tree structure of the classifier
      Overrides:

      Returns:
